short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An alternative to the YouTube 'Channels' tab that was removed by YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Missing the 'Channels' tab on YouTube channel pages? Look no further, this extension offers an alternative to bring this tab back! ðŸ¤©

ðŸ‘€ Instantly view all channels added by a YouTuber with just one click.
ðŸš« No more hassle of scrolling to find the 'Channels' section.

ðŸ›ˆ Background
YouTube removed the 'Channels' and 'About' tabs from all channel pages in November 2023. Instead, YouTube channels can now showcase channels by adding them as a section on their homepage.

Please note that this extension currently only works on the 'Home' tab for YouTube channels that have added this 'Channels' section.
